mapper.select: select id from device where device_sn = #{deviceSn} AND device_status = 0 limit 1

SELECT dev.id, dev.device_sn, dev.product_type, dev.etp_id, etpInfo.etp_name, carInfo.lic_code, carInfo.frame_code, carType.car_type, sysUser.username, sim1.sim, carDev.create_time, dev.device_value, dev.purchase_date, dev.invalid_date, dev.invalid_reason FROM device dev LEFT JOIN device_sim sim1 ON dev.device_sn = sim1.device_sn LEFT JOIN etp_info etpInfo ON dev.etp_id = etpInfo.id LEFT JOIN car_device carDev ON carDev.device_sn = dev.device_sn LEFT JOIN car_info carInfo ON carInfo.id = carDev.car_id LEFT JOIN car_model carModel ON carModel.car_id = carInfo.id LEFT JOIN car_type carType ON carType.id = carModel.tpye_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sysUser ON sysUser.user_id = carInfo.user_id LEFT JOIN etp_info etp ON etp.id = dev.etp_id where dev.device_status = 0 and dev.etp_id in
#{item}
and carDev.device_sn is null
and carDev.device_sn is not null
and etpInfo.etp_name like concat('%',#{query.etpName},'%')
and ( carInfo.lic_code like concat('%',#{query.licOrFrameCode},'%') or carInfo.frame_code like concat('%',#{query.licOrFrameCode},'%') )
and dev.device_sn like concat('%',#{query.deviceSn},'%')
and sysUser.username like concat('%',#{query.username},'%')
and carDev.create_time >= #{query.createTime}
and sim1.sim like concat('%',#{query.sim},'%')
order by dev.create_time desc
select count(device_sn) from car_device where device_sn=#{deviceSn}

SELECT dev.device_sn, dev.product_type, sim1.sim, etp.etp_name, carDev.create_time FROM device dev LEFT JOIN device_sim sim1 ON dev.device_sn = sim1.device_sn LEFT JOIN etp_info etp ON etp.id = dev.etp_id LEFT JOIN car_device carDev ON carDev.device_sn = dev.device_sn WHERE dev.device_sn = #{deviceSn}

SELECT dev.id, dev.device_sn, item.label as lable, dev.etp_id, etpInfo.etp_name, carInfo.lic_code, carInfo.frame_code, carType.car_type, sysUser.username, sim1.sim, carDev.create_time FROM device dev LEFT JOIN device_sim sim1 ON dev.device_sn = sim1.device_sn LEFT JOIN etp_info etpInfo ON dev.etp_id = etpInfo.id LEFT JOIN car_device carDev ON carDev.device_sn = dev.device_sn LEFT JOIN car_info carInfo ON carInfo.id = carDev.car_id LEFT JOIN car_model carModel ON carModel.car_id = carInfo.id LEFT JOIN car_type carType ON carType.id = carModel.tpye_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sysUser ON sysUser.user_id = carInfo.user_id left JOIN sys_dict_item item ON item.`value` = dev.product_type where dev.device_status = 0 and item.type="device_type"
and carDev.device_sn is null
and carDev.device_sn is not null
and dev.etp_id = #{query.etpId}
and etpInfo.etp_name like concat('%',#{query.etpName},'%')
and ( carInfo.lic_code like concat('%',#{query.licOrFrameCode},'%') or carInfo.frame_code like concat('%',#{query.licOrFrameCode},'%') )
and dev.device_sn like concat('%',#{query.deviceSn},'%')
and dev.device_sn in
#{item}
and sysUser.username like concat('%',#{query.username},'%')
and carDev.create_time >= #{query.createTime}
and sim1.sim like concat('%',#{query.sim},'%')
order by dev.create_time desc

SELECT dev.device_sn, dev.product_type, etpInfo.etp_name, carInfo.lic_code, carInfo.frame_code, carType.car_type, sysUser.username, userCar.create_time FROM device dev LEFT JOIN etp_info etpInfo ON dev.etp_id = etpInfo.id LEFT JOIN car_device carDev ON carDev.device_sn = dev.device_sn LEFT JOIN car_info carInfo ON carInfo.id = carDev.car_id LEFT JOIN car_model carModel ON carModel.car_id = carInfo.id LEFT JOIN car_type carType ON carType.id = carModel.tpye_id LEFT JOIN user_car userCar ON userCar.car_id = carInfo.id LEFT JOIN sys_user sysUser ON sysUser.user_id = userCar.user_id where dev.device_status = 0 and dev.device_sn=#{deviceSn}

select info.user_id as userId from car_info info LEFT JOIN car_driver_info carinfo on carinfo.user_id = info.user_id LEFT JOIN car_device car on car.car_id= info.id where car.device_sn =#{deviceSn} and info.del_flag = 0 limit 1
select carin.lic_code as licCode from car_device car LEFT JOIN car_info carin on carin.id = car.car_id LEFT JOIN device de on de.device_sn = car.device_sn where de.device_sn = #{deviceSn}
select carin.id as carId from car_device car LEFT JOIN car_info carin on carin.id = car.car_id LEFT JOIN device de on de.device_sn = car.device_sn where de.device_sn = #{deviceSn}
mapper.delete: delete from car_device where device_sn in #{item}
